Overview:
Checkmyleads.com and the Checkmyleads google sheets™ addon was created to verify leads contact information and help with the sales prospecting process. After creating a list of people to reach out to, you want to ensure that you have verified contact information. This will help you maximize your prospecting efforts by saving you time and ensuring that your emails do not bounce and your phone calls and sms texts get delivered. 

Pricing:
Our addon is pay as you go and there are no on-going monthly costs. Therefore, you only pay for what you use.  

Point Redemption:
Email Point Redemption: (2 Point = 1 Email)
 
Point Buying Options:
visit app.checkmyleads.com 
 
Email Status Description
Valid (green) - The email address passed all checks and is safe to mail.
Invalid - Do not mail (red). The email does not have proper syntax, the domain is dead or the mailbox doesn’t exist. 
 
Support:
If you have any questions or need any help with the plugin, please contact support at support@checkmyleads.com or www.checkmyleads.com/contact
